entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -16.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -16.8°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -22.3°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
